## Slides

```{r}
dates <- dir_ls(here::here("qmd")) %>%
  path_file() %>%
  path_ext_remove()

texts <- dir_ls(here::here("qmd")) %>%
  map(rmarkdown::yaml_front_matter) %>%
  map("title") %>%
  unname() %>%
  str_c(dates, ., sep = ": ")

links <- str_c("./", dates, ".html")
```

```{r, results="asis"}
map2(texts, links, md_link) %>%
  list_c() %>%
  cat(sep = "\n\n")
```
